actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 110 of title 38, United States Code, to liberalize the standard for preservation of disability ratings.

summary.text: Provides that a single break in the continuity of a veteran's total disability rating, for a period of less than one year, followed by restoration to the same or higher disability rating, shall not be considered as disrupting the running of the twenty-year period, for purposes of disability compensation. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 110)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 110 of title 38, United States Code, to liberalize the standard for preservation of disability ratings.
